And<S>2532</S> there appeared<S>3700</S> a great<S>3173</S> wonder<S>4592</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>; a woman<S>1135</S> clothed<S>4016</S> with the sun<S>2246</S>, and<S>2532</S> the moon<S>4582</S> under<S>5270</S> her<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> her<S>846</S> head<S>2776</S> a crown<S>4735</S> of twelve<S>1427</S> stars<S>792</S>: <sup>wonder: or, sign</sup>
And<S>2532</S> she being<S>2192</S> with<S>1722</S> child<S>1064</S> cried<S>2896</S>, travailing in birth<S>5605</S>, and<S>2532</S> pained<S>928</S> to be delivered<S>5088</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there appeared<S>3700</S> another<S>243</S> wonder<S>4592</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>; and<S>2532</S> behold<S>2400</S> a great<S>3173</S> red<S>4450</S> dragon<S>1404</S>, having<S>2192</S> seven<S>2033</S> heads<S>2776</S> and<S>2532</S> ten<S>1176</S> horns<S>2768</S>, and<S>2532</S> seven<S>2033</S> crowns<S>1238</S> upon<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> heads<S>2776</S>. <sup>wonder: or, sign</sup>
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> tail<S>3769</S> drew<S>4951</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of the stars<S>792</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>, and<S>2532</S> did cast<S>906</S> them<S>846</S> to<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> stood<S>2476</S> before<S>1799</S> the woman<S>1135</S> which<S>3588</S> was ready<S>3195</S> to be delivered<S>5088</S>, for<S>2443</S> to devour<S>2719</S> her<S>846</S> child<S>5043</S> as soon as<S>3752</S> it was born<S>5088</S>.
And<S>2532</S> she brought forth<S>5088</S> a man<S>730</S> child<S>5207</S>, who<S>3739</S> was<S>3195</S> to rule<S>4165</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S> with<S>1722</S> a rod<S>4464</S> of iron<S>4603</S>: and<S>2532</S> her<S>846</S> child<S>5043</S> was caught up<S>726</S> unto<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> to his<S>846</S> throne<S>2362</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the woman<S>1135</S> fled<S>5343</S> into<S>1519</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, where<S>3699</S> she hath<S>2192</S> a place<S>5117</S> prepared<S>2090</S> of<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S>, that<S>2443</S> they should feed<S>5142</S> her<S>846</S> there<S>1563</S> a thousand<S>5507</S> two hundred<S>1250</S> and threescore<S>1835</S> days<S>2250</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there was<S>1096</S> war<S>4171</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>: Michael<S>3413</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S> fought<S>4170</S> against<S>2596</S> the dragon<S>1404</S>; and<S>2532</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> fought<S>4170</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S>,
And<S>2532</S> prevailed<S>2480</S> not<S>3756</S>; neither<S>3777</S> was<S>2147</S> their<S>846</S> place<S>5117</S> found<S>2147</S> any more<S>2089</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the great<S>3173</S> dragon<S>1404</S> was cast out<S>906</S>, that old<S>744</S> serpent<S>3789</S>, called<S>2564</S> the Devil<S>1228</S>, and<S>2532</S> Satan<S>4567</S>, which<S>3588</S> deceiveth<S>4105</S> the whole<S>3650</S> world<S>3625</S>: he was cast out<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S> were cast out<S>906</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S> a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S> saying<S>3004</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, Now<S>737</S> is come<S>1096</S> salvation<S>4991</S>, and<S>2532</S> strength<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the power<S>1849</S> of his<S>846</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: for<S>3754</S> the accuser<S>2723</S> of our<S>2257</S> brethren<S>80</S> is cast down<S>2598</S>, which<S>3588</S> accused<S>2725</S> them<S>846</S> before<S>1799</S> our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S> day<S>2250</S> and<S>2532</S> night<S>3571</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they<S>846</S> overcame<S>3528</S> him<S>846</S> by<S>1223</S> the blood<S>129</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S>, and<S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> the word<S>3056</S> of their<S>846</S> testimony<S>3141</S>; and<S>2532</S> they loved<S>25</S> not<S>3756</S> their<S>846</S> lives<S>5590</S> unto<S>891</S> the death<S>2288</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> rejoice<S>2165</S>, ye heavens<S>3772</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye that dwell<S>4637</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>. Woe<S>3759</S> to the inhabiters<S>2730</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> and<S>2532</S> of the sea<S>2281</S>! for<S>3754</S> the devil<S>1228</S> is come down<S>2597</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, having<S>2192</S> great<S>3173</S> wrath<S>2372</S>, because he knoweth<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he hath<S>2192</S> but a short<S>3641</S> time<S>2540</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> saw<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he was cast<S>906</S> unto<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, he persecuted<S>1377</S> the woman<S>1135</S> which<S>3748</S> brought forth<S>5088</S> the man<S>730</S> child.
And<S>2532</S> to the woman<S>1135</S> were given<S>1325</S> two<S>1417</S> wings<S>4420</S> of a great<S>3173</S> eagle<S>105</S>, that<S>2443</S> she might fly<S>4072</S> into<S>1519</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, into<S>1519</S> her<S>846</S> place<S>5117</S>, where<S>3699</S> she is nourished<S>5142</S> for a time<S>1563</S> <S>2540</S>, and<S>2532</S> times<S>2540</S>, and<S>2532</S> half<S>2255</S> a time<S>2540</S>, from<S>575</S> the face<S>4383</S> of the serpent<S>3789</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the serpent<S>3789</S> cast<S>906</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S> water<S>5204</S> as<S>5613</S> a flood<S>4215</S> after<S>3694</S> the woman<S>1135</S>, that<S>2443</S> he might cause<S>4160</S> her<S>5026</S> to be carried away of the flood<S>4216</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the earth<S>1093</S> helped<S>997</S> the woman<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> the earth<S>1093</S> opened<S>455</S> her<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S>, and<S>2532</S> swallowed up<S>2666</S> the flood<S>4215</S> which<S>3739</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> cast<S>906</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the dragon<S>1404</S> was wroth<S>3710</S> with<S>1909</S> the woman<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> went<S>565</S> to make<S>4160</S> war<S>4171</S> with<S>3326</S> the remnant<S>3062</S> of her<S>846</S> seed<S>4690</S>, which<S>3588</S> keep<S>5083</S> the commandments<S>1785</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>2192</S> the testimony<S>3141</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
